translation: He should be known as a perpetual Sannyasi who neither hates nor desires; for, free from the pairs of opposites, O mighty-armed Arjuna, he is easily freed from bondage.
commentary: 5.3 Knowable should be known? Sah he? Nityasannyasi perpetual ascetic? who who? Not not? hates hates? Not not? desires desires? nirdvandvaá¸¥ one free from the pairs of opposites? Hi verily? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? Happiness easily? from bondage from bondage? Pramuchyate is set free.Commentary A man does not become a Sannyasi by merely giving up actions because of laziness or ignorance or some family arrel or calamity
